title: Poster
inscribed: Imprinted in black, lower margin: “KOSMOS” MUINTEZET BUDAPEST; Imprinted lower left: Les Maîtres de l’Affiche PL. 208 / Imprimerie Chaix / (Encres Lorilleux & Cie.)
provenance: Dr. Richard Grant; 1988: acquired by Museum
description: Image depicts a landscape of a man ploughing a field with two bulls. Text above and below in Hungarian.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster. Lithograph on paper. Gift of Dr. Richard Grant. 1988-63-1.
